p: The quality of water used for plants watering during the test period corresponded to free chlorine potable water, and no toxic heavy metals were detected. As, Cd, Co, Cr, Ni, Pb, V, Mo, Se, and Sb values were below the method quantification limits. Moreover, Cu 5.1 µg/L, Mn 2.6 µg/L, Fe 39.3 µg/L, Zn 16.3 µg/L, Ca 41.8 µg/L, Mg 4.8 µg/L, and Al 109 µg/L were found in the soaking water.
